programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: With the help of Fleisher's Grass-Fed and Organic Meats butchers, Emeril prepares seared tri-tip steak with bearnaise sauce and grilled flat-iron steak with avocado, tomato, and red onion salad

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril offers some delicious meatless entrees: udon noodle stir-fry with crunchy vegetables, hearty kale and chickpea stew, and eggplant and squash lasagna

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril's brunch will feed a bunch! Cheesy country ham omelet, followed by warm popovers with creamy Creole shrimp, Prosecco and orange sorbet with Cointreau cocktail

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: You don't have to sacrifice taste when eating light! Emeril prepares cod in miso broth with enoki mushrooms, edamame, and pea sprouts, and Thai-style beef salad with cabbages and julienned carrots

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril prepares "kicked-up" sandwiches with the Radio City Rockettes: spicy eggplant with mozzarella and basil, porchetta with dandelion greens, and Elvis Presley-inspired peanut butter and banana

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril prepares healthy kids' meals: baked chicken fingers with creamy dreamy dipping sauce, edamame with sesame oil, and hot and hearty minestrone soup. Both kids and parents will love these dishes!

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Make delicious Asian dishes with Emeril's recipes: chicken and veggie stir-fry with cellophane noodles, beef and soba noodle stir-fry, and cold-noodle salad with honey-sesame dressing and peanuts

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.sub-title: What to Cook When There's Nothing in the Pantry
programme.desc: What can you cook when there's nothing in the pantry? Emeril shares recipes that require minimal ingredients: vegetable frittata, easy fettuccine with bacon and peas, and roasted garlic soup.

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril will how you how to create authentic Mexican flavors: chicken and green chile tamales with roasted tomato salsa and tres leches cake

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Gabrielle Deculus in celebrating creole culture with Chicken Sauce Piquante and Creamy Grits and Grillades.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and Big Freedia in the kitchen as he whips up her favorite meal of Fried Fish with Smothered Greens and Andouille Potato Salad. Emeril will also share his recipe for Bounce Gumbo, named in Big Freedia's honor.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.sub-title: with Johnny Slamon and EJ Lagasse
programme.desc: Join Emeril in his kitchen as he recreates some of his restaurant's best dishes with EJ Lagasse and Johnny Slamon.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and Abita CEO Dave Blossman as they explore a menu inspired by his beers. Get ready to try Creole Duck Breast with Beer and Cherry Glaze and Bratwurst Cooked in Beer with Apple Sauerkraut.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and Voodoo priestesses Brandi and Maggie as they explore a menu inspired by their annual Voodoo Fest in New Orleans. Get ready to try Black-Eyed Pea Jambalaya and Ham Hock and Cabbage Soup.
